input_text:
Job Title: FSQA and Laboratory Summer Intern

Location: Springdale, AR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Job Details:

SUMMARY:

Responsibilities will vary from performing one procedure or work instruction to a number of analytical chemistry or quality system procedures or work instructions in a Food Safety Laboratory. Precision and accuracy in performance of the work instructions and data collection is essential; must be able to maintain ISO records for process control and comply with quality system and safety requirements. Team member will be responsible for working with cross functional teams for enhanced business support. Other duties as assigned.

REQUIRMENTS: 

Education: A minimum of a High School diploma or equivalent with active enrollment in a college/university. Prefer college level courses or degree in Biology Microbiology Chemistry Food Science and or Physical Sciences.

Experience: Prefer laboratory experience.

Computer Skills: General knowledge of Windows Microsoft Office Applications.

Communication Skills: Good verbal and written communication skills.

Physical Requirements: Stand and or sit continuously and perform job functions for a full shift with meal break. Supervisory: N A

Position-Specific Requirements: This internship is a summer role where candidates are expected to work in person full-time (40 hours per week) during the summer. This is a paid internship located in Springdale, Arkansas.

APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS:

 Candidates considering further education after degree completion must highlight this on their resume to ensure full consideration. Must include resume to be considered.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

1ST SHIFT (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: FSQA and Laboratory Summer Intern
output_json.summary: Internship role varying in analytical chemistry or quality system procedures.
preferred_degrees: High School diploma or equivalent with active enrollment in college/university
job_responsibilities: Performing analytical chemistry or quality system procedures
Complying with quality system and safety requirements
output_json.physical_requirements: Stand or sit continuously for a full shift with meal break
benefits: Health, life, dental, vision, and prescription drug benefits

other.content: Candidates must highlight further education plans on their resume for full consideration. Must include resume to be considered.
Must complete additional information task after submission.
For California residents, details on personal information collection and usage can be found here.
